pages.text: In $(#f00)Battle of Evercraft$(), the world difficulty and loot quality adjust dynamically to various factors, making the experience more challenging over time.$(br2)It is important to $(l)not underestimate$() the zones, especially when there are many players online.

pages.title: Variables:
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Number of players online,$() the more players online, the $(#f00)stronger$() the mobs will be.$(br)$(li)$(l)Distance from spawn,$() as you move away from the spawn point, the zones will progressively get more difficult.$(br)$(li)$(l)Playtime,$() the longer the game goes on, the more the difficulty increases.$(br)$(li)$(l)Zones, biomes, and dimensions,$() some areas have a particularly higher difficulty level ($(o)e.g.: $(#f00)Nether$() and $(3)End$()).
